Sentencas: Ni-YSZ cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) were fabricated at various sintering temperatures from NiO-YSZ composite particles made by spray pyrolysis (SP) technique.
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO-YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: NiO particles covered with fine YSZ (Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2) particles were used as the composite particles, and the initial ratio of Ni and YSZ was set at 75:25 (mol%).
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO-YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: As a result, the cermet anode sintered at 1350 degreesC showed the morphology in which fine YSZ grains were uniformly dispersed on the surface of Ni grain network.
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO-YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: Electrical performance such as electrochemical activity and internal resistance of a Ni-YSZ cermet anode changed with sintering temperature.
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO-YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: The anode fabricated at 1350 degreesC showed the highest electrical performance.
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO-YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: Especially, a single cell voltage with the Ni-YSZ cermet anode kept very stable for 8000 h at 1000 degreesC in the SOFC operation condition of H-2-3% H2O and air.
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO-YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: The cermet anode after a long-term test had its initial morphology.
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO-YSZ composite particles

Sentencas: It indicates that the Ni-YSZ cermet anode fabricated from NiO-YSZ composite particles is a very promising material for its practical use as SOFCs.
Titulo: Performance and stability of SOFC anode fabricated from NiO-YSZ composite particles
